name: Fly.io
headline: Run full stack apps close to your users.
description: We run app servers and databases close to end users. Developers deploy their apps to Fly.io (it's about the simplest place to deploy a Docker Image) and use our CLI to launch instances in regions that are most important for their application.

![](https://fly.io/phx/ui/images/cloud-city-a61199fec62cd744415fcdf4e1be8434.png?vsn=d)
#  A Public Cloud Built For Developers Who _Ship_
**Over 3 million apps** have launched on Fly.io, leveraging global Anycast load-balancing, zero-config private networking, hardware isolation, and instant WireGuard VPN connections, with push-button deployments scaling to thousands of instances. 
[ Deploy Your App in 5 minutes ](https://fly.io/</app/sign-up>)
##  Public Cloud Infrastructure. Modern Platform Endorphins. 
The most flexible and powerful compute platform on any public cloud. Fly Machines are hardware-virtualized containers, running on our own hardware, that launch instantly and run exactly as long as you want them to — for a single HTTP request, or for weeks of uptime. 
![](https://fly.io/phx/ui/images/fly-globe-cb332f77ddb429aa3ef4e0a2c6c592ba.png?vsn=d)
  * ##  Get Right in Your Users’ Faces 
Deploy in 35 regions, from Sydney to São Paulo, for sub-100ms response times and native-app feel no matter where your users are. 
  * ##  Fork Off VMs Like They’re Processes 
Fly Machines start fast enough to handle HTTP requests, run only when you need them, and scale into tens of thousands of instances. 
  * ##  Ship GPU-Boosted Models 
From LLMs to inferencing, hardware acceleration with the same developer experience as a simple CRUD app. 
  * ##  Built for Distributed Systems 
Clustered databases like Cockroach, globally-distributed Postgres, and modern RPC systems like Elixir FLAME, no Terraform required. 


![](https://fly.io/phx/ui/images/cool-bird-d997174954ab5a152ccac3d2dcb19c8d.png?vsn=d)
##  Support By Developers For Developers 
Paid support packages include a team of actual engineers (not chatbots) who themselves ship code on our platform. Emergency support and guaranteed response times available. 
[ Learn More ](https://fly.io/</support>)
##  Enterprise-Ready 
Apps running on Fly Machines are KVM hardware-isolated, built on a memory-safe stack and running directly on our own metal. 
[ Enterprise Features ](https://fly.io/</enterprise>) [ Fly.io Security ](https://fly.io/</security>)
  * Single Sign-On 
  * Guaranteed Support Response Times 
  * SOC2 Type 2 Attested 
  * Memory-safe Rust and Go stack 
  * CI/CD Integration 


##  Trusted by teams at 
  * [ Supabase ](https://fly.io/<https:/supabase.com>)
  * [ Tailscale ](https://fly.io/<https:/tailscale.com>)
  * [ Tigris ](https://fly.io/<https:/tigrisdata.com>)
  * [ Upstash ](https://fly.io/<https:/upstash.com>)
  * [ Turso ](https://fly.io/<https:/turso.tech/>)
  * [ Mailgun ](https://fly.io/<https:/mailgun.com>)
  * [ Fanatics ](https://fly.io/<https:/fanatics.com>)
  * [ SavvyCal ](https://fly.io/<https:/savvycal.com>)
  * [ Acast ](https://fly.io/<https:/acast.com>)
  * [ Glide ](https://fly.io/<https:/glideapps.com>)


  * [ Supabase ](https://fly.io/<https:/supabase.com>)
  * [ Tailscale ](https://fly.io/<https:/tailscale.com>)
  * [ Tigris ](https://fly.io/<https:/tigrisdata.com>)
  * [ Upstash ](https://fly.io/<https:/upstash.com>)
  * [ Turso ](https://fly.io/<https:/turso.tech/>)
  * [ Mailgun ](https://fly.io/<https:/mailgun.com>)
  * [ Fanatics ](https://fly.io/<https:/fanatics.com>)
  * [ SavvyCal ](https://fly.io/<https:/savvycal.com>)
  * [ Acast ](https://fly.io/<https:/acast.com>)
  * [ Glide ](https://fly.io/<https:/glideapps.com>)


![](https://fly.io/phx/ui/images/js-love-b469706c4be3625b972ee3fdfcb80687.png?vsn=d)
##  Serverful JavaScript Without the Hassle of Serverless 
Imagine if a server could boot as fast as a serverless function? That's Fly Machines—serverless compute is a trade-off you no longer need to make. Graduate to a full-stack cloud to regain control over your stack & hosting bill. 
  * ###  Boots in 250ms or Less 
Functions and apps boot and respond to web requests in 250ms or less with Fly Machines. You decide to keep them running or automatically put them to sleep. 
  * ###  Built for JavaScript Developers 
JavaScript, TypeScript, Bun, Deno—whatever your flavor, Fly Launch automatically detects your runtime and generates a VM with everything you need to run your app. 
  * ###  Real GPUs & CPUs on the Edge 
Run workloads that require GPUs or lots of CPUs, memory, and storage in over 30 regions around the world—all interconnected by a private, encrypted WireGuard network that works out of the box. 


##  Use the Tech You Love 
Build with your favorite framework. No Dockerfile? No problem: our CLI generates containers for most popular frameworks, including Rails, Phoenix, Django, Node, Laravel, and .NET. 
[ Learn More ](https://fly.io/</docs/speedrun/>)
  * [ Phoenix Framework ](https://fly.io/</phoenix/>)
  * [ SvelteKit ](https://fly.io/</sveltekit/>)
  * [ Ruby on Rails ](https://fly.io/</rails/>)
  * [ Docker ](https://fly.io/</docs/getting-started/dockerfile/>)
  * [ Go ](https://fly.io/</docs/getting-started/golang/>)
  * [ Rust ](https://fly.io/</docs/rust/>)
  * [ Django ](https://fly.io/</django/>)
  * [ Laravel ](https://fly.io/</laravel/>)
  * [ NextJS ](https://fly.io/</nextjs/>)


![](https://fly.io/phx/ui/images/better-together-bg-630f84dc36727cb3216fe4536c3687db.png?vsn=d)
##  Developer-Focused Public Cloud 
Help us build the next public cloud. No, seriously. Is your product something devs can take advantage of to ship better apps? Work with us. 
[ Build A Cloud For Developers ](https://fly.io/</developer-cloud>)

generated_description:
### Fly.io: Running Full Stack Apps Closer to Users

**Overview**  
Founded in 2020 and part of Y Combinator’s W20 batch, Fly.io aims to simplify the deployment of full-stack applications by allowing developers to run their apps in proximity to users. With headquartered operations in Chicago, IL and a team of around 72 employees, Fly.io is built for developers who want their applications to be as responsive and reliable as possible.

**Mission**  
The mission of Fly.io is straightforward: to run full stack applications close to users. This is part of a larger vision to bridge the gap between developers and their end-users by reducing latency and enhancing performance.

**Product Offering**  
Fly.io focuses on providing a developer-centric cloud infrastructure. Over 3 million applications have been deployed on their platform, utilizing features such as:

- **Global Anycast Load Balancing**: Ensuring quick, reliable access to your applications, no matter where users are located.
- **Zero-Config Private Networking**: Simplifying the complexities of networking for distributed applications.
- **Instant Deployment**: Developers can deploy their Docker images with just a few commands through the CLI in as little as five minutes.

Their infrastructure includes Fly Machines—virtualized containers that can handle everything from a single HTTP request to long-running applications, all without the hassle of traditional server management.

**Key Features**  
1. **Regional Deployments**: With the capability to deploy apps in 35 regions worldwide (like Sydney and São Paulo), Fly.io guarantees sub-100ms response times.
2. **Scalability**: The system is built to handle scaling on-demand, meaning instances can run only when needed, easily adjusting to traffic spikes.
3. **Support for Modern Frameworks**: Fly.io supports various frameworks including Ruby on Rails, Django, Node.js, and more, making it accessible to a broad range of developers.

**Community and Support**  
Fly.io prides itself on its support system, which is human-centered. Engineers who actually work on and use the platform provide support, ensuring that clients receive informed assistance when they need it.

**Client Base**  
Some of the notable companies using Fly.io's services include Supabase, Tailscale, and Mailgun, which showcases the platform's growing traction within the developer community.

**Conclusion**  
In a landscape crowded with cloud providers, Fly.io stands out by focusing purely on developer experience and minimizing the friction typically associated with app deployment. Their approach not only makes it simpler to launch apps but also ensures that performance stays top-notch regardless of the user's location.

For developers looking to enhance their app’s performance with a developer-friendly touch, Fly.io might just be the tool you need. You can get started or learn more at [fly.io](https://fly.io).
